bioconda.name: bioconductor-path2ppi
bioconda.summary: Prediction of pathway-related protein-protein interaction networks

biotools.summary: Package to predict pathway specific protein-protein interaction (PPI) networks in target organisms for which only a view information about PPIs is available.

bioschemas.name: PATH2PPI
bioschemas.summary: Package to predict pathway specific protein-protein interaction (PPI) networks in target organisms for which only a view information about PPIs is available.
